A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The good points:
The movie is entertaining with some good visuals.
The bad points:
It is full of nonsensical plot holes and poor writing
Characters act out-of-character 
Rey is like Wonder Woman with super powers and master jedi warrior without any training - it is not believable
Leia can fly through space
Male characters are ridiculed and treated like cowards\, blundering fools\, hotheads\, etc
Battles don't make sense\, why do the First Order ships chase the 'Rebel' ship to run out of fuel instead of trapping it and surrounding it.
Snoke turned out to be an empty random villain.
Fin is treated like a joke 
There are so many flaws in the script and story telling that you can't count it.
Rian Johnson basically destroyed Star Wars with poor writing and an illogical script
